website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty cover that will fit a variety of watercraft.
pros: Consists of UV-and mildew-resistant fabric for maximum versatility
Designed to deliver advanced protection against dirt, dust, wind, and UV rays
Boasts rear air vents that reduce inside moisture
Includes a handy zippered fuel tank access door on both sides
cons: Fit may be too tight for some watercraft

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these when I bought them because they looked cheap (and were) but they fit awesome on 2013 KAW 1500 STX J skis. The zippers are cheap as hell and were broke when they came out of the bag, but the cover itself is good quality and fits tight and EASY to install, unlike the factory canvas ones. When I say broke on the zippers I mean they were split open so once I zipped them up and back they stayed put but they won't last long I can see already.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: 2nd trip out on the road. Went about 350 miles
customer_reviews.text: Cheap...already faded after 2 weeks in the sun. Then started tearing to shreads in the back...the seam ripped, and the air vent flap was shreading in the center of the Vent area. Garbage...This is why you should buy genuine covers. It'll last 6-10 years versus a few weeks. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Bowlie

customer_reviews.title: Necessary protection from the elements
customer_reviews.text: Straps where different than expected but doable and of good use none the less, love the colors and quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyl

customer_reviews.title: Color has faded after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: The color has faded, however, the fabric is still in good shape. Not a perfect fit, There is a small area between the bars and the front trunk (about 12" diameter) that has a small sag that may allow water to pool - this will likely be the failure point. Also very tight for my 141" long 2019 Yamaha FX Cruiser HO (purchased cover rated for 136-145" 3 seat PWC). If your PWC is longer than 141", it will be very difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice. Buy once!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. If you measure correctly, you will get a snug fit as seen in the sellers image. I like the tie downs, no need for bungee cords. I didn't notice those were provided. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my 2003 Seadoo nice and snug and seams to be of higher quality than the previous cover I bought at a much higher price. I will have to see how it wears to be able to provide a complete review.
customer_reviews.author: Rlet

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I should trust the chart not the reviews I bought this for a 98 seadoo gtx Ltd and it's to big but not bad One size smaller will be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Color has faded after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: The color has faded, however, the fabric is still in good shape. Not a perfect fit, but acceptable. Very tight for a 132" 2019 Yamaha VX Cruiser HO (purchased cover for 126-135" 3 seat PWC). If your PWC is longer than 133", it will be very difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product allows water to get in while sitting still. Product is a little loose at the center. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product allows water to get in while sitting still. Product is a little loose at the center. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: It Fit!!
customer_reviews.text: The cover for our personal water craft was as promoted and fit perfectly!! Supplier shipped more quickly than I expected. Very good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Gay H. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and shipped to my door in 2 days. Will buy more for my other jetskis.
customer_reviews.author: hdiegel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, be careful of sizing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my SeaDoo wave runners. I have two 2006 model SeaDoos, a Wake and RXP. Overall product seems good, the only caution is around sizing. Definitely go one size up from recommended if you have models that meet the length but sizable height including the handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: George Harter

customer_reviews.title: Fading fast...
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Not the best fit but does the job. Colors fading out within a few weeks though. We'll see how long it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality I only had it on the JetSki a month so I’ll see how it does over the winter
customer_reviews.author: John F. Arnone

customer_reviews.title: Great quality poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materiel it just doesn’t fit all that well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover. Nice quality and easy to put on hopefully it holds up through the winter
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Sweet looking covers
customer_reviews.text: Great covers, lightweight and made of quality materials. I’ll update review after a winter and hot summer and see how they hold up. Initial impression is good.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for longer lasting look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer and I was excited but after I put it on the cover had lost its color I was hoping it would last a lot longer but it didn’t I love the look and how it fits but the color fades after the first 7 months
customer_reviews.author: victor jr rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my Yamaha VX Cruiser Ho. I also liked the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sniper

customer_reviews.title: Fast fading not a true burgundy
customer_reviews.text: Color was not really burgundy. Fast faded color And is going to crack soon from sun. Be careful on this buy. Good cover for inside storage
customer_reviews.author: Mark Casamento

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2019 seadoo gti great. Looks nice in the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: holly campbell

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 3 person jet ski.
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit our jet ski; too short. My husband didn’t try it until it was too late to return .
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: 99 gtx limited
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a nice cover fits ok on ski could be better fit around bars but ok over all only been on ski for a day so cant say much more good deal
customer_reviews.author: william D Mclawhon

customer_reviews.title: Color has faded some over summer
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, ties down nicely. Color has faded some over the summer, still very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Well made cover that fits well..
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks good, fits well and is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jetski Cover
customer_reviews.text: To cover my PWC up. It arrived ahead of schedule and I was very pleased with the Package that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: color bled
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but the red color bled onto my seat the first weekend I had it on.
customer_reviews.author: JODI HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very durable cover! Just what I needed, Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Trini E. Gaitan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality
customer_reviews.text: 03 seadoo gtx 4tec it fits like it should 135"
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Kelley

customer_reviews.title: JetSki covers
customer_reviews.text: Too big so they work fairly well for storage but can't keep them on for traveling. Medium quality only.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: It fit very well. We cover it on our lift, and do not use it for trailering. The tie-downs seem substantial, the cover is ample enough to easily stretch over the jet port and sides of the JetSki. Quick delivery. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and seems to be of good quality. Has been in the sun now for about 2 months and holds up to my expectations. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrislarson757

product_meta.title: Jetpro Trailerable PWC Watercraft Jet Ski Cover Burgundy/Black Fits from 126"-135"(3 Seater)
product_meta.description: Color:Burgundy/Black| Size:Fits from 126"-135"(3 seater)Personal Watercraft Covers feature a heavy and extremely durable Marine Grade 600D fabric that is treated during the manufacturing process to help weatherproof the fabric for maximum water resistance. This cover has a mildew resistant fabric that also protects against rain, snow, dirt, dust and harmful UV rays. Standard is a strong elastic shock-cord hem around bottom of cover to help ensure a tight fit as well as a built-in trailering system with quick release buckles to keep cover secure while trailering. Some of it's added features are air vents that help reduce billowing during travel and moisture for accumulating inside the cover. A free storage bag is also included. Comes in four color combinations.
feature_bullets: Strong, heavy duty extreme durable U.V. and mildew resistant fabric for maximum protection against Sun, rain, dirt and pollutants
Ideal for storage and hauling by offering Integrated trailering system with built-in quick adjusting straps
Rear air vents reduce inside moisture and wind lofting. Handy zippered fuel tank access door on both side
Elastic cord hem for a fast, tight fit. Built-in strap keepers secure excess strap after tightening. Quick adjusting side-release strap buckles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
